 *
1.context_after: All fertilizers, whether chemical or organic, are labeled with a three-part number that indicates the concentration of nitrogen, phosphorus, and potassium, respectively. When buying a pre-mixed dry organic fertilizer, a simple, effective way to determine if it will offer your plants what they need is to check this number. If you need a balanced fertilizer, for instance, you should look for one with a 5-5-5 or 10-10-10 label. If you need to give your plants a dose of potassium, however, look for a fertilizer with a heavier dose of potassium, like a 0-0-12 fertilizer.

104.sentence_1: To be safest, just assume that everything you bring is going to get wet.
104.sentence_2: To be safest <as you pack>, just assume that everything you bring is going to get wet.
104.context_before: At the very least, aim to drink 16oz or more of water in the hour leading up to your swim. Stuff phones, electronics, and valuables in resealable plastic bags.
104.context_after: If you are taking things like your mobile phone that can't get wet, take them in a separate small bag, pockets of your clothes or a waterproof bag which you can put in your swimming bag.

105.sentence_1: An exterior installation works better for bay windows.
105.sentence_2: An exterior installation works better for bay windows <as it provides more mobility>.
105.context_before:
If your frame has predrilled holes, you can insert the screws into those, but make sure you only attach the top ones. The bottom of the frame should still be able to move freely. 
 * Pay attention to whether you’re mounting the frame and shutters to the interior or the exterior of the window.
105.context_after: 3. Use a level to make sure the frame sections are even. Use a level to check that each side of your shutter frame is even. For an easy installation of the shutter panels, you want to make sure your frame is level before moving on.

106.sentence_2: Remove weeds by hand or <small tool>.
106.context_before:
* Cultivate the vegetable garden as soon as you see weeds sprouting. Eliminating weeds as soon as they appear will prevent the weeds from going to seed, and will therefore reduce the number of weeds in your garden. 
 2.
106.context_after: Hand-pulling weeds can be a slow process, but it is necessary even in large gardens. Weeds may sprout along the base of plants or between closely spaced rows of vegetables, where cultivation with a hoe or garden tiller may cause damage to the plants. In these cases, hand-pulling is the only safe solution to remove the weeds.    * Pull weeds with your hands, or use a Hori Hori (a Japanese digging tool), a small garden spade or a garden trowel.

107.sentence_1: Reducing watering may reduce the chance of it spreading.
107.sentence_2: Reducing watering may reduce the chance of it spreading, <as will growing it in containers>.
107.context_before:
## Warnings
 
  * Goji berries can be invasive so if you see in spreading to areas of your yard where do not want it pull it our right away.

108.sentence_1: For example, you may use a window pane as a wall decoration.
108.sentence_2: For example, you may use a window pane or <a rug> as a wall decoration.
108.context_before:
This means you can pile cushions on the sofa or on your bed, add lots of decorative pieces to the walls and on shelves, and put up multi-colored curtains and bedding. The options are unlimited, and you can have fun with your choices. 
 * You can even choose to repurpose pieces as accents.
108.context_after: 5. Pick bold, bright colors. One of the keys to Bohemian decor is the color scheme. Bold, bright colors of any shade can complement a Bohemian room.
